attributes.action: That Tom Baker be given a Knighthood in the Jubilee Honours List
attributes.additional_details:
Tom Baker has been entertaining this country for 50 years in one guise or another.
A great many people consider him the best Dr Who ever and his other contributions to acting and education (The Book Tower) as well as his general eccentricitymake him a well loved figure that ought to be rewarded by a grateful nation.
